SEARCH

Package gutek.gui.charts

package gutek.gui.charts
This package contains classes representing various charts used in the application.
  • StatisticsChart - The base class for all chart classes in this package.
  • Each specific chart class inherits from StatisticsChart and represents a distinct type of chart displayed in the application.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    gutek.gui
    This package contains the main graphical user interface (GUI) components, organized into several sub-packages: charts - Classes for creating and managing charts used in the application. controllers - Controllers for handling various JavaFX controls, including: Controllers for ListView JavaFX controls. Controllers for managing decks. Controllers used during application initialization. Main view controllers. Controllers for menu components: the main menu bar and deck management menus. A primary class for storing the main Stage and loading specific Scenes. controls - JavaFX controls used across the application.
    gutek.gui.controllers
    This package contains all JavaFX controllers used in the application.
    gutek.gui.controls
    This package contains additional custom controls used for displaying various elements of the application.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddedNewChart
    A chart component that displays the number of new cards added per day over a specified range.
    AppearanceTimeRegularRevisionChart
    A chart component that displays the number of cards scheduled for regular revision over a specified range of days.
    AppearanceTimeReverseRevisionChart
    A chart component that displays the number of cards scheduled for reverse revision over a specified range of days.
    RegularRevisionChart
    A chart component that displays the number of cards scheduled for regular revision over a specified range of days.
    ReverseRevisionChart
    A chart component that displays the number of cards scheduled for reverse revision over a specified range of days.
    RevisedForTheFirstTimeChart
    A chart component that displays the number of cards revised for the first time over a specified range of days.
    StatisticsChart
    An abstract class representing a statistics chart for decks.
